results.title: Metformin Induces Cell Cycle Arrest, Reduced Proliferation, Wound Healing Impairment In Vivo and Is Associated to Clinical Outcomes in Diabetic Foot Ulcer Patients
results.text_hl: However, little is known about the role that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment have on other cell types such as keratinocytes and whether exposure to @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ of these cells might have serious repercussions in wound healing delay and in the development of complications in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Foot_Ulcer</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016523 @@@foot ulcers@@@ or in their exacerbation.

citations.NLM: Ochoa-Gonzalez F, Cervantes-Villagrana AR, Fernandez-Ruiz JC, Nava-Ramirez HS, Hernandez-Correa AC, Enciso-Moreno JA, Castañeda-Delgado JE. Metformin Induces Cell Cycle Arrest, Reduced Proliferation, Wound Healing Impairment In Vivo and Is Associated to Clinical Outcomes in Diabetic Foot Ulcer Patients PLoS One. 2016;11(3):e0150900. PMID: 26963096
